reviews.review: Compra obligatoria, mejor si es en algun pack que tenga toda la franquicia ya que asi podras pasarte todo lo de esta increible saga. Representa mas que solo hacer un videojuego, sino de como darle vida, en ambientarle, en sentir que estas ahi. ¡¡¡GABE!!! aprende a contar hasta 3! DIOS.

Este juego fue un golpe de aire fresco en los shooters y la continuacion de la historia de Gordon Freeman. La historia es complemente atrayente donde vemos lo que ocurre 10 años despues de lo ocurrido en Half Life. Un gran juego e indispensable jugarlo. Claramente es Must have.
Un clasico que nunca pasa de moda...
I nominated this for "Most Deserving of a Sequel." Wake up Mr. Freeman, you've been sleeping on the job.
Uma das melhores obras em termos de história que eu já ví, vai te prender desde o início até o fim do ep. 2. Para quem (se é que tem alguém) ainda não possuí esse jogo, fica a dica.
zugeben, schon ziemlich alt und ein "schnöder Shooter", aber die Grafik war damals schon beeindruckend ;)
Un Gran juego en Pocas alabras

This is the highest standard for an FPS game, and you know that means this game is that good.

No seriously, this game changed FPS games as we know them today.

Ce jeu est simplement une pure merveille, les level design sont intélligent, l'histoire est prenante et les personnages attachants. Personellement, je passe mon temps a chercher des easter egg et de cachettes sympa.
A recommender a tout joueur de la master race.
Najlepsza strzelanka z elementami sci-fi w którą grałem.
Игра проверенная временем во всех аспектах! Одна из самых любимых мной игр и самых лучших игр в своем роде! Очень хороший баланс геймплея и отличный футуристично-научный сюжет делают свое дело.
One of the best games of all time. A must play for any PC gamer.
This game has stood the test of time, still living up to the fps genre while also giving us a great story.
It's not as ground breaking as the first one. Nontheless, Half Life 2 is a great game.

I nominate this game for "The Steam Awards"! I thought I've already posted a review about this game, but it looks like I didn't lol. Anyways, this game has given me so many memories when I first played it. It was outstanding! I also played this game through with some friends of mine and it just made me burst with joyness! The Half-life series is awesome and just fun! I do recommend playing this game, as well as the rest of the Half-life games. You're basically this man who is trying to escape this "Dystopian" city with civilians, so they don't have to be trapped and be treated unfairly by the Combine. I don't want to make any spoilers, but that was just a little hint on what the game is about. You should definetly buy this game since it's on sale right now! I rate this game a 10/10! ^_^
No steam library would complete without this masterpiece
Best
Best game ever.

dear steam user base , if you have not played this game or any Half life game , tou have two options:

play this game , and feel a heart wrenching emotion and sadness that is taken by the void of depression as you wait for years for some kind of resolution to a beautiful cliffhanger. A game that has made fans become mad with tin foiled hats , theories ,data-mining, memes and even conspiracies.

Or don't, releiving yourself of a joyless burden,  with the exception that you have missed out on undoubtedly the best game of all time; which redifined the Gaming landscape in scope , narrative , Gameplay , graphics and physics at the time of release - a game that still holds up today.

But their is another way.... Vote for "The Please Make Half-Life 3 Award" in the "we didn't think of  everything Award" for the Steam Autumn /thanksgiving/black friday/ whatever you want to call it now sale. maybe valve will than listen and we can get the ending to a narrative we have cared for at least 18 years :)
Продолжения!
12 лет прошло , а 3 халва так и не вышла))0)
Best game ever.
Good game !

One of my favourite game! I played hl 1 as well but hl 2 has it's own effectual. It's 2016 and i am still playing this game. It can't be accidental. Ep 1 and 2 just enchance the experience. The only negative i can say...the missing of ep 3/hl 3. ^^
Лучший шутер проверенный временем!
Much good game. Must get XD
its a classic
Amazing
Einfach episches Spiel

EXCELLENT JEU.
J ATTENDS HALF LIFE 3

Um dos melhores jogos de todos os tempos e o melhor para muitos! Jogabilidade, historia(pra mim o grande forte do jogo) e gráficos (até hoje me surpreendo com os gráficos, para um game de 2004, trouxe muito mais avanço do que o Crysis em relação a gráficos) são todos perfeitos. O jogo não fica chato em nenhum momento, ação totalmente em tempo real. Todo mundo deveria joga-lo! 
A Obra-prima da Valve!
Пока не выйдет Half-Life 3, лучше Half-Life 2 всё равно ничего не выпустят. (кроме Portal 2)
Zamanın Eskitemediği Oyun...
Gran clasico, increibles graficas (Para la epoca claro esta), sobre todo una exelente historia. recomendado al 100%

Half Life 2 ist der grund warum ich einen Steam account erstellt habe.

Mitlerweile habe ich den account seit fast 3 Jahren und ich habe 161 Spiele. 11 von diesen Spielen gehören zu Half Life.
Die reihe hat mich tief beeindruckt ich warte auf Half Life 3...
one of the all time classics never gets old

half-life
noun
the time taken for the radioactivity of a specified isotope to fall to half its original value.
the time required for any specified property (e.g., the concentration of a substance in the body) to decrease by half.
